text: Carlota Suzanne Osten (20 June 1944 - 28 October 2024) was a Swedish movie director, stage director, academic and screenwriter. She won the award for Best Director at the 22nd Guldbagge Awards for the movie The Mozart Brothers. Osten was born in Stockholm, Sweden. Her career began in 1971. Osten died on 28 October 2024, at a hospital in Stockholm from problems caused by heart surgery at the age of 80.Dramatikern Suzanne Osten d√∂d ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Swedish movie directors Category:Swedish academics Category:Swedish screenwriters Category:Theatre directors Category:Writers from Stockholm Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Swedish playwrights
title: Suzanne Osten
